instructions_text: Knock as many pieces off the platform as you can. You get some points for just moving pieces from their start position and you get a bonus for knocking them off. You have a limited number of cubes to shoot for each level. Use them wisely!
controls_text:
Keyboard & Mouse: W A S D or arrow keys to move. Drag the target with the mouse. Hold the space bar to charge and release to fire.

Touch: Two finger drag up/down/left/right. One finger drag to aim. Hold down on target to charge, release to fire.
